apexLogGetDescription: Fetch debug logs from your org by specifying a specific log ID or the number of logs to return.
apexLogGetHelp:
Executing this command fetches the specified log or given number of most recent logs from your default scratch org.
To get the IDs for your debug logs, run 'sfdx force:apex:log:list'.
Use the --logid parameter to return a specific log.
Use the --number parameter to return the specified number of recent logs.
Executing this command without parameters returns the most recent log.
logLevelFlagDescription: The logging level for this command invocation. Logs are stored in $HOME/.sfdx/sfdx.log.
colorFlagDescription: Apply default colors to noteworthy log lines
logIDFlagDescription: ID of the log to display.
numberFlagDescription: Number of most recent logs to display.
outputDirFlagDescription: Folder for saving the log files
